alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 26 at 3:26PM CST until November 26 at 4:15PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Eastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Western Pearl River County in southern Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CST. * At 325 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abita Springs, or 10 miles east of Covington, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Abita Springs, Varnado, Sun, Bush, Crossroads and Angie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
